title: Car Parking Counter (Personal Project)
description: The project is a prototype for a parking gate that uses an ultrasonic sensor to detect cars. A servo motor controls the gate, allowing a maximum of three cars to enter. If a fourth car tries to enter, the gate remains closed. Exiting cars can press a button to open the gate. LED indicators display the current car count
materials: ESP8266 D1 R1, Ultrasonic Sensor,Servo Motor 9G, LED, 220 Ohm Resistor, Push Button
